website_summaries.verdict: This acne spray will last you a long time and because it can be used upside down, it's easy to reach all parts of your body.
pros: A little of this spray goes a long way
The spray bottle is easy to use and can be used upside down
It doesn't leave skin sticky or smelly
Some users have reported visible improvement in as little as a week
cons: It's a little pricey, and it takes a little time to dry after you apply it

customer_reviews.title: Product is great, but sprayer malfunctions often on third-part sales
customer_reviews.text: This product is often back-ordered on the Murad website, so I've tried to purchase it here as well as other major beauty websites. My experience is that at least 50% of the bottles I purchase from third-party sellers - not just here, but other stores -- have sprayers that won't work. Since the bottle can't be opened to pour the liquid into another bottle, you're basically out $40 bucks or more. So be forewarned. Maybe Murad dumps their defective products for others to re-sell, I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: Zelda F.

customer_reviews.title: Great for bad teenage puberty acne
customer_reviews.text: After desperately searching for a product that would work for my teenagers back acne and face acne I found this. Mind you his dr prescribed retin-a, which I didn’t want him to use because I’m aware of the side affects. This stuff is a miracle in a bottle. After just one week, no more break outs, just red dots everywhere that are healing! WINNER WINNER!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.5150

customer_reviews.title: Just ordered my second bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried everything under the sun to help cure my backne and on my chest. Nothing has ever really quite done the job. I use this after I shower at night and sometimes in the morning and the results so far have been GREAT! Though it has not completely stopped my breakouts, I will get maybe once a week whereas before my back was completely plastered with them. The spray bottle is super easy to use on yourself and though this doesn't smell like roses obviously, I totally recommend. Wish there was a bit more in the bottle (you can't exactly feel once it's empty and obviously this isn't cheap) but I definitely recommed using it!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline L.

customer_reviews.title: Photos included- works quick and works well!
customer_reviews.text: I have spent a lot of money trying to get rid of my face and body acne. MURAD has been the only product that has proven to work and give instant results. I am amaze at how well it works. I have uploaded two photos to show you how quick it works. I hope this helps someone. After just 3 days of using the product, I have clearer skin. So happy I discovered this.
customer_reviews.author: Britney B.

customer_reviews.title: Wow.
customer_reviews.text: Teen son with acne on back and face has been using this product for about a year now. The difference is amazing. He is an athlete and showers often and had tried grocery store and specialty products, but this has worked the best. He likes that he can hold the bottle any direction to reach those places affected by acne without asking for help applying. It hasn't dried his skin too much, like some products, and he will go shirtless now, which he never did before. Only thing I don't like is that it feels empty, even when full, so it is hard to gauge when to order the next bottle to keep him in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Tlhos

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have been using Murad products for years and this body spray is great. I can spray my face, my back, with the bottle upside down, rightside up, any way I need to in order to reach very part I need to cover. It's very lightweight and absorbs quickly. Does not leave a residue or a sticky feeling, and does not irritated my skin (I have very sensitive skin) at all. Plus keeps my skin clear of acne!!
customer_reviews.author: C O LL

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing. I had breakouts on my back and chest ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I had breakouts on my back and chest from summer heat and sports bras and I couldn't seem to cure it with showers after exercise and cotton clothes throughout the day. It's a great 360 spray so you can spray from any angle. I used it everyday for about 2 weeks until everything was clear and now I use it every other day. I use it when I get out of the shower at night immediately after drying off. It's sticky for a minute but once it dries, you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha A

customer_reviews.title: The only body acne product that works!
customer_reviews.text: This product in conjunction with the Acne Body Wash had been the only thing that has worked for my chest and back. I started using this product about a month before my wedding and it cleared up all bumps I had as well as kept them away even when I ran out of the product and had not used it in a while. The 360 spray nozel also makes it extremely easy to spray your back and reach all areas!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders!
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to us from a friend who worked for dermatology office. It has worked wonders for my son and his back acne.
customer_reviews.author: MJE

customer_reviews.title: Acne be gone
customer_reviews.text: This has really helped with my back and chest acne. It really does spray from any angle, and I've tried it in a variety of positions just to be sure. I use it along with the Murad acne wash. I still get a few blemishes here and there but nothing like what I used to get without them. I do warn that it can be drying to your skin, especially in winter so I would use a lotion/moisturizer along with this.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Works great!  When it works....
customer_reviews.text: This product works great! But every few times I order this the spray mechanism is defective. Rather than spraying it just squirts a stream of liquid. That is annoying and I have to worry about that each time I order. But it does work!
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply effective treatment for body breakouts.
customer_reviews.text: Using this after showering was one of the only things that really helped treat and prevent the cystic pimples I was getting on my chest and back in the winter months. The 360 degree spray applicator makes it so easy to spray on your upper back or anywhere. The spray is a light mist and it sort of smells nice. I would recommend this to anyone having body acne issues or breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie S.

customer_reviews.title: especially for covering larger areas like your back
customer_reviews.text: I sometimes breakout with mild acne on my shoulders and upper back. This is the only thing that will clear it up quickly. I always keep a bottle on hand. The spray bottle is convenient, especially for covering larger areas like your back. Pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Shemiah

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: This is working very good. I am very Impressed I have only used this a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Nuckols

customer_reviews.title: Murad Has a Winner Against Bacne
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best. From the smooth, 360° spray that goes on “dry” and doesn’t clog to the texture that isn’t sticky at all, Murad has made a great product. We use this after showering to help treat (and eliminate future) “bacne” breakouts on the back & shoulders. It really works.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had really severe backacne. And I am not paid to do this. I just want someone to get rid of the same problem. I tried the oxyderm I think that what its called it was an orange little bottle which was 7 bucks. It made it worst and spread my acne to the lower back which at first i had no issue. So I left a bad review on that one, you guys can go back and see it. But, anyways, this product work miracles for me and hope it does for you. Pro: it sprays upside down and feels fresh cool feeling when sprayed. Con: it only .5 %, but still work!!! Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail product
customer_reviews.text: I tried this on a whim and I’m so glad I did. This is the only product I’ve ever used that has actually eliminated body acne. It took a week for me to start seeing results and I don’t remember the last time my skin has felt this smooth. The price may be off-putting, but it’s done wonders for my confidence so for me, it’s worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool upside down spray option!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this spray, I spritz it on right after getting out of the shower and it seems to make my back pimples go away. The scent is not too strong and fades away after it dries. What is cool about this is that it squirts upside down and sideways so its easy to use by one person alone.
customer_reviews.author: AlwaysShoppin

customer_reviews.title: Too strong for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This just too strong for sensitive skin. Cause my back peel and red
customer_reviews.author: JoJo D.

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product withfor about a year and it's really cleared up my back. I can go a couple days without using the spray, like when on vacation, without new break outs. Hasn't dried out my skin, and I use it daily. I would definitely recommend getting and using both! Worth the price. I've been able to find it cheaper on amazon than at beauty stores and other online sites.
customer_reviews.author: MarianT

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for body acne
customer_reviews.text: It's the only thing that has worked, I use it morning and night and it's not too strong even for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Actually works!
customer_reviews.text: This actually works! We have tried a lot of different products, but this one really works. Perfect for athletes. It doesn’t even sting. Clears it right up. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great! Clears up any body breakout in a day or two
customer_reviews.author: NurseV

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product! It greatly reduces bacne and shoulder acne issues. No irritation or dryness, amazing for inflamed skin. The bottle ran out quick though, probably should offer larger sizes or cheaper price for the oz given
customer_reviews.author: Malik

customer_reviews.title: Hhmmm....not sure yet...
customer_reviews.text: Been using for about three weeks now and not super impressed with results. But in all fairness to the product, I had a pretty severe case of shoulder acne with significant hyperpigmentation. One thing I did notice is that skin is noticeably smoother. I will definitely continue to use and purchase atleast once more when this bottle runs out. Now if only I could find something to diminish these dark spots. *sighs*
customer_reviews.author: JustLovely

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the product. I use it on my back since I have severe bacne and I really am embarrassed when people see it. I usually shower then use this product just so my back will not collect dirt/oil and my pores are open so it helps a lot better. I still have acne on my back but it is definitely tamed and slowly healing. I think this product has definitely done a lot more than any other product I have used. And I have very oily/dense skin.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: The spray has worked quite well. It's not as drying as some sprays, which allows me to use it more often. The spray can be used upside down and comes out in a nice fine mist. It doesn't burn your nostrils as much as other body sprays (like the Glytone, which has a higher salicylic percentage). Recommended and will buy again when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: August Luna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. Time will tell if it's actually effective for me. It seems to be helping. I do have to say that the cooling sensation wins me over. It soothes any skin irritation. The somewhat minty smell isn't strong enough to linger on the skin for long. I was worried it might smell like icy hot but it does not. I have no complaints about this product.
customer_reviews.author: ChanChan

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this product. Helps clear body acne and help prevent it. Love the 360* spray feature.
customer_reviews.author: CM.Hoffy

customer_reviews.title: The product arrived in great condition and looked as picture
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in great condition and looked as picture. However, I don't find that it works at all. In my experience Neutrogena's spray is FAR more effective and much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: only product that tames my back acne
customer_reviews.text: I love that you can spray this stuff upside down. I use it about 4x per week and it's the only thing that will keep my back and shoulders clear.
customer_reviews.author: RCN

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after reading all the rave reviews. Broke me out even more than I already was on my back. Terribly drying. If your acne comes from a compromised moisture barrier, this product will only make your problem worse.
customer_reviews.author: AprilMay

customer_reviews.title: Finally something that works
customer_reviews.text: I have used several products to help with my back acne. However, many of the products did not work. I used this together with the Neutrogena Grapefruit Body wash. The combination seems to be helping. I have been using it for 2 weeks now and my breakouts have virtually stopped. The only problem is that the bottle is almost done. Good thing I bought 2. I suggest you do the same thing as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lawyerdude82

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recomend!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down one of the best acne products out there. Before I first purchased it I was skeptical especially since it is pretty pricey, but I am so glad I decided to go for it. I noticed results within the first several days of using it and I have not been able to find anything that works even remotely as good.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great for Backne!
customer_reviews.text: If you get acne on your back this is the best stuff - it sprays on easily and dries quickly. I also use it regularly on my chest for preventitive treatment (I like wearing V necks) - I never get pimples when I have been using this stuff on my chest. Pricey yes but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Prettyfuzzy

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to treat some back breakouts. It's fine- sort of the equivalent of using a salicylic acid toner. Nice but not super effective. The upside down pump is definitely a plus, making it easier to apply. It did last me a while. Overall, Murad is too pricey for 'nice' in my opinion. About the same price as a dermatologist copay, which ended up being WAY more effective.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Stops break-outs
customer_reviews.text: Tried this product for the ingredient salicylic acid. The product aids in drying up acne break outs and prevents reoccurrence. Be careful not to use too much because it caused peeling, Used in moderation, the product does what it promises, clears and prevents blemishes and skin breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: C P

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was breaking out badly on my upper arms and shoulders. I used this spray with the Murad Acne Bodywash. It cleared up in about 2-3 days! I was amazed.
customer_reviews.author: bjkm9789

customer_reviews.title: Miracle cure for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have not had any luck with any other product to remove the bumps I get on my chest and upper back from time to time. I am a police officer - and after 12 hours in layers of Kevlar and sweat - it's hard to have clear skin all the time. Well, since using this spray ( I use it right after each shower - one light layer by my collarbones and across) I have been 100% blemish free. No joke. I have not had a single bump. I have not even been using this product a full month yet and I'm clear. Miracle? Perhaps. But I'll take it.
customer_reviews.author: KnucklecakesTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: So glad I tried this!
customer_reviews.text: I use this religiously after showering and have noticed a huge improvement in my skin. It is easy to apply to my back with no help from my husband. I'm on my third bottle and the results keep getting better and better.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlie C

customer_reviews.title: Clarifying body spray
customer_reviews.text: I thought it might help with what I intended to use it on but it really didn't make a difference. I have super sensitive skin so it burned when I applied it. You never know it may work for you, everyone is different. You have to try something in order to know if it'll work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Elove

customer_reviews.title: I suffer from bad back acne
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from bad back acne. This has always been my go too. I see results within days, I will only use this.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had taken before and after pictures! Within 3 days of once a day use, I noticed my pores were smaller. Then after a week my blemishes had decreased dramatically. I used this product on my upper thighs and my under arms. Best. Product. Ever.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Best out there!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing works better for the acne on my back. I use this whenever I get out of the shower. No sticky residue, no dying clothes. I love it. Works better than any other brand I've tried. I have been using for years now.
customer_reviews.author: lmmercurio

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bacne!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my back acne and this product keeps it at bay better than anything else I've used on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Good for back acne
customer_reviews.text: I had bad back acne and nothing ever worked. I went to the dermatologist and she had me try a whole heck of a lot of things that made it worst including chemical burn in my back. This product with a sulfur cleanse helped my back acne and now I am still using it as maintenance to keep my acne at bay. The bottle's sprayer is nice since you can turn in everyday and product would still disperse
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine_Michele

customer_reviews.title: Takes a while...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for about a month now and it has really started working. When I first used it, it made me break out WORSE actually but from my experience with other acne products I know this is a common thing. I use it almost everyday and I can now see a real difference. I don't think its a miracle worker by any means but it has helped.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great for body acne
customer_reviews.text: Sealed well. I usually get this at Sephora but it's much cheaper on here for the same product. Really helps to keep my cystic back acne at bay. Must use every day though. Easy spray nozzle. Doesn't clog often.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: This makes you skin feel refreshed and clean. It's gentle and helps heal the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: I have had some bacne problems for a year. Have used this spray for about a week. It is all gone!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Onnen

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it's too mild for my skin.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd try this instead of the Glytone 2% Back Acne Spray. It doesn't work on me, but I'll keep it for an astringent. I had to buy the Glytone. . .that clears up my back acne right away.
customer_reviews.author: SurfingPanda

customer_reviews.title: Great after shower
customer_reviews.text: Spray top always goes bad but I love thus product
customer_reviews.author: american sociopath

customer_reviews.title: Has a cool feel once applied
customer_reviews.text: sprays upside down. Has a cool feel once applied. I have noticed a difference. The dark spots are fading
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone

customer_reviews.title: Clearing up My Acne
customer_reviews.text: This has been working so good to get acne on my back under control. It’s been a great product for me & my needs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this spray. I had a problem with back acne and this cleared it right up. I have tried body washes, spot treatments, and many other things, but this stuff finally did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: JClendenin

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product. Have not seen any results in two months. Takes forever to dry when you spray it on. Only nice thing is how you can use it at an angle.
customer_reviews.author: Frazzeled

customer_reviews.title: Amazing acne product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product...works great! My son gets acne on his back and gets really itchy so I spray this product on and he gets instant relief!
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this regularly on break outs and it works well. I lasts forever!
customer_reviews.author: piscesfille

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have been using for 3 weeks now, and I have been able to clear up my breakouts on my back. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works but takes time
customer_reviews.text: I suddenly broke out on my back and needed something to cover it up. this spray is convenient to use and does not leave any marks on your clothes. the reason I gave it 4 stars is that, it takes time to show results.
customer_reviews.author: saasha17

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey but worth every penny. Noticed results in less than a week. Been using 4 months now with very few break outs.
customer_reviews.author: Tarah M. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this!! It sprays upside down for hard to reach on back. Thats the only place i have breakouts in summer. Cleared it up in 3 days. I will order more for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works very well hard to reach area like your back that someone will have acne and clears it
customer_reviews.author: Mirian

customer_reviews.title: Beware alligator skin
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could return this. It made my skin worse. It dried it out even when I tried using it 1-2 per week. Not for me.
customer_reviews.author: spratrat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and super easy to buy from Amazon.com!
customer_reviews.author: Michele McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product, in the sense that it made my skin feel very fresh and clean. That being said, I saw no difference whatsoever in my acne.
customer_reviews.author: C. D.

customer_reviews.title: I feel like if he would use it consistently it would work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son. I feel like if he would use it consistently it would work. Just one time and I can see the redness fade. We use it on his back.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Williams

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Spray
customer_reviews.text: I received the product on time and the packaging was fine, but the bottle does not spray. It does not work and I am unable to open to poor into another bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Moran

customer_reviews.title: Problem with the spray
customer_reviews.text: My second time to buy this product. The first time worked perfectly fine on me, remarked decrease in the blemishes and breakout on my back and the spray was so good. THIS TIME the spray was much different and spray only in a focussed so i need to spray alot to cover my back. Iam not satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Amel S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have been using it for years. It's perfect on the body, especially if you work out and wear your hair down (dancing, performing, etc.) You can spray this on your back to avoid possible break outs caused by hair products or creams mixing with 'workout sweat'. Very effective.
customer_reviews.author: patriziainla

customer_reviews.title: great for chest and back
customer_reviews.text: or other hard to reach places that tend to break out. It really works if you use it consistently after bathing
customer_reviews.author: S.S.X.

customer_reviews.title: It seems to help a little bit
customer_reviews.text: I did notice it seems to help a little bit but not as much as I was looking for. I do like the fact it is not harsh or dries out my skin.
customer_reviews.author: vonB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It is a little bit expensive but well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for just a week and I see results already. It has a fresh scent, which refreshes my skin at every use. I definitely recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: VF_Review

customer_reviews.title: My life saver to back & chest acne since 2011 ...
customer_reviews.text: My life saver to back & chest acne since 2011. Still going strong. I use it once daily in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA NGUYEN

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product and a good program.
customer_reviews.text: I have had back me for most of my life. It is only in my late 40s I am finding a solution that does not completely clear the problem but mostly clears it. This is a product that has to be used faithfully and will take up to a couple of months before you see real results. I use this with Murad's body wash scrub, since it also has salicylic acid. If you were going to use this on your back, I advise you to get something like a lotion applicator, sprayed on the surface of that and use it to spread evenly on your back.
customer_reviews.author: Slim

customer_reviews.title: Not great, not bad...
customer_reviews.text: Used it for 6 weeks, did not really make my backne better, but also not worst so maybe that says something. Not sure if I'd buy again. Got the same results as the Neutrogena spray in the orange bottle and that one had similar ingredients at half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dee

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: I've struggled with acne on my back for many years. It's such a hard place to clean well. This product makes it easy. It's easy to spray in the hard to reach places. I've been using it for a couple of weeks now, and I am very pleased with the results. I am thankful for finding out about this product. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It is so convenient to use and it works, for me. But, when I stop using it, my blemishes came back less than a month after. So I am back on it.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me at all and I used it religiously 2x a day.
customer_reviews.author: eastcoastgirlak

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well!! Cleaned up all of my body acne in a number of days.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Moore

customer_reviews.title: looked like it was opened and sitting on the shelf for years
customer_reviews.text: The seal on this bottle was broken, and the bottle looked cheap and filthy like it was sitting on the shelf for years. The spray was no more effective than locally bought at the grocery store with the same ingredients. The bottle could spray upside down, but that's the only positive thing about this overpriced medicine I can think of.
customer_reviews.author: Dan D

customer_reviews.title: amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: one of the best products out today! it smells great, it makes my skin feel awesome, and i love it! oh and the shipping is CRAZY FAST!
customer_reviews.author: sweetbrownshuger

customer_reviews.title: ... a few months now and my back is 95% better. No more giant blemishes
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a few months now and my back is 95% better. No more giant blemishes. All that remains is a dark spots from previous acne, but even those are fading with time. This is the first product that truly worked for me and I will continue to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: terrible product didnt do anything will not buy at all...wasted my money ...dont buy this product ...i had no change in my skin condition it felt like i was applying water on my body no action or reaction... poor didnt work for me... my opinion..
customer_reviews.author: Charles K. Mutinda

customer_reviews.title: Works!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several remedies for acne on the back of my legs. Never heard of anyone else with this problem.... this stuff really works. It took about 4 weeks, but its about 60% better,and I will continue using it. I am confident it will be mostly gone in another 4 weeks. A bit costly but worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Country Mouse

customer_reviews.title: bad product and not working
customer_reviews.text: Some people have reviewed this as working for their skin, but I think its too basic and week. The acid level is only 0.5%. This level might actually be better for people with sensitive skin, but if you often use 2% or higher sylical acid, then this product is over priced. -Have been using it for 2 months with no improvement!
customer_reviews.author: Mohsin Shabbir

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Took about a week to see a definite change. After 2 weeks, smooth and clear skin again! :D
customer_reviews.author: Debzzzzz

customer_reviews.title: Used after 2-3 months
customer_reviews.text: This is really sad, this produce stop working for me. I don't know why but I'm back to the same amount of back acne like I had before. I'm searching for a new product to reduce my blemishes and right now I haven't found any. I'm still working on it. (Age:16)
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Amour

customer_reviews.title: Best product I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many products to reduce the amount of acne I would get on my back and chest since I never assumed anything could completely rid me of the problem. I am grateful for having discovered the Murad Acne clarifying spray because it's no longer an issue for me as long as I continue using it. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Armando I. Santana

customer_reviews.title: Not afraid to sweat
customer_reviews.text: I CrossFit in the Louisiana heat -this stuff keeps my back clean and clear!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: This product Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: In the warmer months my back kept breaking out due to sweating and the leather in my car, as soon as I got onto this product it cleared it right up! And nothing to date has ever done that! The only issue I see is that you do need to keep using it to sustain no breakouts, it runs out fast and is expensive. BUT IT WORKS. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Callipyge

customer_reviews.title: Used the body wash and this every day for almost ...
customer_reviews.text: Used the body wash and this every day for almost 2 months and didn't see the slightest change. Apparently it works for a lot of people but I was not one of them.
customer_reviews.author: killface4prez

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this stuff for years! Happy to have found it a litle cheaper then where i bought it before. This is the only product that can clear up my back and keep it clear as well!! Sooo worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Waskis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Use this after you wash with Murad Acne Body Wash, my back cleared up in under two weeks, I strongly recommend to anyone wanting to clear up any body blemishes.
customer_reviews.author: Jbyrer

customer_reviews.title: Seriously effective
customer_reviews.text: I use this once a day after I take a shower in the morning and it is seriously the only product that has ever cleared up the acne on my back. I've tried prescription topicals, medicated body washes, and oral treatments and this is by far the most effective product out of all of them. Also, the 360 spray is helpful in reaching my back. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a few days now and I'm indifferent. It has a very noticeable cooling feeling when applied, and it sprays decently well. It came quickly and undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Not very effective..
customer_reviews.text: I have moderate to severe back/body acne. I've used this product as directed, starting off with one application and working it up to 2-3 times daily but haven't seen any improvement. It does have a 'cool' feeling on the skin that's really nice but it has done nothing for my acne problem. Not a very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Mancini24

customer_reviews.title: meh.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for months and I see no change. At least it didn't get worse....not buying this again
customer_reviews.author: Ga Yeon Hwang

customer_reviews.title: love murad!!
customer_reviews.text: i've been using this for 2 years or so on an off and i love it! helps control breakouts and prevent future ones.
customer_reviews.author: maria
